title: ROER4D – Open Education for a Multicultural World: A report from the Research on Open Educational Resources for Development in the Global South

author: Cheryl Hodgkinson-Williams, Centre for Educational Technology, University of Cape Town

A project that's following on from some of the ones that have been undertaken.
